item.description:
Night Two... We'll meet to explore the big city lights.

First we'll catch the evening lights on the water and around the Harbor, then work with reflections and other types of night lights.

There are plenty of subjects in this one area from the reflections of the night lights on the water and buildings to the colorful Northern Avenue bridge and the city lights off in the distance and even the character of the Barking Crab restaurant.

More details will be provided re: getting there as the date gets closer.

Hope to see you there... Dianne
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside the Barking Crab restaurant at the entrance to the Northern Avenue bridge.
item.name: Friday Night Lights Two ::: Boston
